elements.text: Your dream job was just posted, and the site says a Master's Degree is required. You have always thought about going back to school, but you are fearful HD symptoms will begin when you've already made a financial commitment. After thinking it over, you decide to...

elements.name: Master's Degree_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
